fullText: This production doesn't just honor Kushner's epic; it makes us feel, viscerally, why it matters so much, and why it will endure.
dtliExcerpt: This production doesn't just honor Kushner's epic; it makes us feel, viscerally, why it matters so much, and why it will endure.
bwwExcerpt: Sometimes, just when you need it most, a play courses into your system like a transfusion of new blood. You feel freshly awakened to the infinite possibilities not only of theater but also of the teeming world beyond. And when you hit the streets afterward, every one of your senses is singing....
